alert.note: Alert for Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:10PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lake and northwestern Orange Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1209 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mid Florida Lakes, or near Tavares, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Apopka, Eustis, Tavares, Mount Dora and Howey-In-the-hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. On rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Northern Lake County; Orange; Southern Lake County
